stores.name: Melo Melanj
stores.description: Independent vinyl music store from Cluj-Napoca.

stores.name: Dusty Sounds Records
stores.description: Selling and buying old records. Genre: rock, jazz, pop, electronic

stores.name: Two Sides Records
stores.description: A venue run by music enthusiasts/ record collectors/ art/ stories/ coffee & nature lovers.

reviews.text: Good assortment of styles. Very helpful staff.  There is hardly a time when I stepped through their door and left empty handed.
Some fine selection of exquisite tunes. A record store worth visiting.
Best record store in Cluj! Nice chat, time and patience to play and try records. Definitely worth it!

I'm very pleased to see that such places still exist and that people keep showing interest in their activity. I've recently acquired a record player and was looking around websites for some new records to buy, ended up visiting this store.
Excellent. I finally made it here after missing out in my last two visits to Bucharest. The shop is in an alleyway, hard to miss if you pay attention to the signs.
Worth putting in the effort to find.
Cozy, comfortable home store with a large range of experimental and indie records. The seller was super kind and helpful. A must visit for audiophiles in Bucharest.
Great collection in a cozy place! The neat part is that you can listen to the records before purchasing. Will definitely return!
Cool shop, has some authentic Romanian folk music. They lack a listening station though.
